channel.title: Zombie invasion
channel.description:
I was thinking, that anyone, who dies. In a zombie invasion, deserves to die. For many reasons. 1. Zombies are slow. (doesn't apply to io9) 2. Zombies are weak. So a metal gate, should be able to hold them back. Unless, they have enough of their brain left to climb it. Or the zombie is yao ming. Or the zombie was a cheer leader. Or is black (sry africans, maybe they still have sum aids left) 3. Shes not your mother anymore. Kill her. 4. Whether you believe removing the head, or a strong blow to the head knocks out a zombie, it's not too hard to sneak up on one. "blow their mother fucking heads off" - samuel jackson
the only way you could die, is if it's the begining phase. where your husband comes into your room and bites you. one by one. people get infected. until such time that a decent person catches on(don't except me to catch on) , and saves everyone.
Anything else to single out, and intimidate the poor victoms of a zombie attack?

they’ll do warm ups.

crack[/quote]

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:23, topic:235613”]Thing is, how do you define a zombie?

  1. A dead person, that comes to live again.

  2. A dead person, that is controlled by something else.

Both are easy to get rid of. Nr. 1 is practicly impossible, because after a few hours a corpse is stiffer then an erected penis. So moving around won’t be easy. Nr. 2 has the same problems as Nr. 1.

So at the end, defining a zombie isn’t neccesary, and this post was useless.[/quote]
nr.1 was what the post was about. and it isnt next to impossible. all you have to do is blow their mother fucking heads off.
nr.2, blow the mother fucking head off the guy who controlls them

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Thing is, how do you define a zombie?

  1. A dead person, that comes to live again.

  2. A dead person, that is controlled by something else.

Both are easy to get rid of. Nr. 1 is practicly impossible, because after a few hours a corpse is stiffer then an erected penis. So moving around won’t be easy. Nr. 2 has the same problems as Nr. 1.

So at the end, defining a zombie isn’t neccesary, and this post was useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

the fu superior:

2. Zombies are weak. So a metal gate, should be able to hold them back. Unless, they have enough of their brain left to climb it. Or the zombie is yao ming. Or the zombie was a cheer leader. Or is black (sry africans, maybe they still have sum aids left)

I’m not so sure. Have you not played video games? Usually when there are zombies, and you get caught by one, it’s rather difficult to get away. A good example of this would be The Legend of Zelda, as I know the early version on N64 had zombies, and they would hold onto you for a bit, and sometimes weren’t the easiest things to kill.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @Drunkard18 Drunkard18
item.description:
@Drunkard18 wrote:

Ahh, but we are talking about regular zombies, that come from an infection of the brain and nervous system i shall call necropsychsclerosis, not the necromatic zombies that come from resurrection.

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

If they’re smart enough to some how resurrect themselves [or someone else is smart enough to bring them back from the dead], they probably will retain/learn that information. Of course, the chances of any of that happening are extremely, extremely low.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @Drunkard18 Drunkard18
item.description:
@Drunkard18 wrote:

It all matters on how much modern-day smarts they retain after being infected, and since no studies on zombies in a few centuries at the least, we are not so sure of this.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie invasion

item.description:

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @Drunkard18 Drunkard18
item.description:
@Drunkard18 wrote:

As long as you live in a small town, with not too many pedestrians, a zombie outbreak would be unable to support itself, as there would not be many people walking out on the streets to infect, although, if they are super-zombies, which are able to survive for long amounts of time without any nutrients etc. they would be able to wait for months on hand, until people of the town have to come out.

Although, many zombies are admittedly not very smart, and would end up doing something extremely stupid and end up dying anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie invasion

item.description:

Some zombies are extremely fast, although you have to admit when they walk slowly it is more creepy. And a zombie outbreak is the reason I have a sword, oh yea and guns too, but in the event of slow moving zombies a sword would be best.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie invasion
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

But if the infection starts at the morning, there could be many infected and more by the night, because some people don’t listen to news and they will be killed while in sleep.

Living shouldn’t be really hard, you should only find a treehouse or something where zombies can’t get, so you can sleep at night without fear of getting infected. You could easily get food from abandoned stores if you make quick runs everyday, easier with a friend. Gun would help alot in tough situations.

Read full topic
